MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the EH48 postcode area of Bathgate, affecting properties in Napier Avenue and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9:13PM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the complexity of the repairs required on our underground cable fault and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:40 PM on Sunday, 28 February 2021
